title: Database Reference
description: A reference to an item in a database. In most cases, the actual object can be used instead of a database reference. For example, instead of making a reference to a separate Person file, you can simply include the data for that Person inline.

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of object. Must be set to `DatabaseReference`.

abbreviation.title: Referenced Abbreviation
abbreviation.description: The abbreviation of the referenced database item.

id.title: Referenced ID
id.description: The ID of the referenced database item

index.title: Referenced Index
index.description: The index of the referenced database item. Indexes should start at 1 rather than 0 to increase human readability.

key.title: Referenced Key
key.description: The key of the referenced database item.

referenceType.title: Referenced Item Type
referenceType.description: The type of database item being referenced

url.title: Referenced URL
url.description: The URL of the referenced database item
